headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HAHN, ROBERT A

snippet: HAHN--Robert A. Born December 4, 1958, New Hyde Park, New York, died April 20, 2016, Bethesda, Maryland. Loving son of Muriel F. Hahn and the late George A. Hahn, cherished brother of Elizabeth J. Dyckman and Richard F. Hahn and brother-in-law of Dr. Richard H. Dyckman and Dr. Rebecca T. Hahn, doting uncle of Katherine S. Hahn, Abigail M. Hahn, Rebecca A. Dyckman and Rachel H. Dyckman, beloved fiancee of Wenli Cai. An accomplished lawyer and quick wit, Bob was a gentle soul who loved travel, books, movies, Chinese culture and, most of all, family and friends, A graveside service will be held on Sunday, April 24, 2016 at 11am at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, New York. In lieu of flowers, contributions can be made to Crohn's & Colitis Foundation of America. 1/3

An accomplished lawyer and quick wit, Bob was a gentle soul who loved travel, books, movies, Chinese culture and, most of all, family and friends, A graveside service will be held on Sunday, April 24, 2016 at 11am at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, New York.
